1504450.name: Lost Assassin - A Tale of AI Corruption
1504450.description:
You are a retired anti-corruption Assassin for the mainframe '5eus'. However, upon reading the news one day, you notice something odd. The mainframe appears to be behaving strangely, allegedly taking over planets in far quadrants for selfish purposes by sending electrical probes into the atmosphere, disabling all living creatures. This all began on planet ‘Apollis’ where many of the inhabitants are missing. Patrolling AI drones have been spotted roaming around the '6aia gem' mines, a major fuel source for the universe. Assassin leaves retirement and reboots the original directive: Remove Corrupted Files. Find the source of the corruption and restore order to the universe, one planet at a time.

- Range of weapons, grenades and powerups

- Upgrade abilities

- Responsive enemy AI with ragdoll physics (recently upgraded)

- Mine resources and use them for crafting supplies

- Jetpack and double jump to reach tough spots

Much more to come as we continue development.
1504450.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
